titleStmt.title: Act of Privy Council, discharging any leavies or recruits for the service of the States-General of the United Provinces. Edinburgh, the nineteenth day of January, 1688.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Extracted forth from the records of Privy Council, by Mr. Colin McKenzie clerk to his Majesties most honourable Privy Council.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
